title: Ex-Situ Exsolved Ni-Ru Alloy from Nickel-Ruthenium Co-doped SrFeO3-δ Perovskite as a Potential Catalyst for C=C and C=O Hydrogenation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00170B, Paper
Bhavisha Meloth , Balamurugan Sarkarainadar, Gopinath S Chinnakonda, Sakthivel Ayyamperumal
In this investigation, the synthesis of Ni and Ru co-doped SrFeO3-δ (SrFe1-x-yNixRuyO3-δ) perovskite materials were achieved through the utilization of sol-gel combustion followed by annealing treatment. The resulting annealed materials...
